contexts.context: "The Test of Evasion requires the observer to examine the <mark>obstacle</mark>, and compare his resources and abilities; if the obstacle...
...obstacle, and compare his resources and abilities; if the <mark>obstacle</mark> is too difficult, seek for a path around the difficulty...
"The Test ofConfrontation requires the observer to examine the <mark>obstacle</mark>, and compare his resources and abilities; if the obstacle...
...obstacle, and compare his resources and abilities; if the <mark>obstacle</mark> is too difficult, look for a path around the difficulty...
...but if no path around can be found, confront the <mark>obstacle</mark> directly."
...few will dare to stand against your might. But one <mark>obstacle</mark> remains. His name is Arkay.
